revised_title: Fossil Flora of Bovey Tracey: Miocene Formation and White Clay Analysis
tldr: The author examines the fossil flora of Bovey Tracey, identifying plants from the Miocene formation and analyzing the differences between the flora found in the lignite beds and the overlying white clay. The study reveals a sub-tropical climate during the Miocene period and a colder, diluvial climate during the formation of the white clay.
